k1 s1 ssk s1 k1 s1 k1 * remaining 64 72 or your multiple times 8 round 18 with cc * s1 k1 * rounds 19 and 20 with mc k1 * s1 k3 * end round with s1 k2 round 21 decrease with cc * k2tog k6 * remaining 56 63 or your multiple times 7 round 22 with cc knit all stitches round 23 decrease with mc k2 * s1 k2 k2tog k2 * end round with s1 k2 k2tog remaining 48 54 or your multiple times 6 round 24 with mc k2 * s1 k5 * end round with s1 k3 rounds 25 and 26 with cc k1 * s1 k1 s1 k3 * end round with s1 k1 s1 k2 round 27 decrease with mc * s1 k1 s1 k1 k2tog * remaining 40 45 or your multiple times 5 round 28 with mc * s1 k1 s1 k2 * round 29 decrease with cc k1 * s1 k1 k2tog k1 * end round with s1 k1 k2tog remaining 32 36 or your multiple times 4 round 30 with cc k1 * s1 k3 * end round with s1 k2 round 31 decrease with mc * k2tog k2 * remaining 24 27 or your multiple times 3 round 32 with mc knit all stitches cut the mc yarn leaving a 6 tail to be woven in round 33 decrease with cc * k2tog s1 * remaining 16 18 or your multiple times 2 round 34 with cc * k1 s1 * round 35 decrease with cc * ssk * remaining 8 9 or your multiple finish your hat by cutting or breaking the yarn leaving an 8 tail using a tapestry or darning needle run the yarn through the remaining stitches and pull tight weave in the ends securely block your hat and enjoy designed by anne kamsvaag all rights reserved page 3 © 2017 anne kamsvaag do not copy translate distribute or publish without prior written consent use these 3 charts if your main color used for the ribbing is light and the contrast color is dark abbreviations mc main color * * stitch instructions between cc contrast color the two stars should be repeated m1 make a new stitch you can use any increase method over and over until the end of the k knit round for example k1 * s1 s1 slip one stitch as if to purl holding the yarn in back k5 * end round with s1 k4 k2tog knit 2 stitches together means that you should knit the ssk slip 1 stitch from left needle to right needle as if to first stitch then slip 1 knit 5 knit without
